# üöÄ Username Radar

![Radar Animation](https://cdn.pixabay.com/animation/2022/11/13/04/07/04-07-28-574_512.gif)

## üîç What is Username Radar?
**Username Radar** is an **offline, safe, and lightweight username generator & ranking tool**  
built to help you find **rare, clean, and brandable usernames**.

‚úÖ No login  
‚úÖ No Discord API usage  
‚úÖ No tracking  
‚úÖ Works fully **offline**

---

## üß† Features
- Generate **3L & 4L usernames**
- Pronounceable & mixed generation modes
- Smart **rarity scoring system**
- Click to copy usernames instantly
- Mark usernames as:
  - Available
  - Taken
  - Unverified
- Local history saved in your browser
- Export results as **CSV**
- Clean Discord-style UI

![UI Animation](https://images-wixmp-ed30a86b8c4ca887773594c2.wixmp.com/f/bfe77e11-cf9c-4c86-af55-76465ae201e5/der9kra-3509b09d-459a-44f7-b215-b7916859bafb.gif?token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..UjPc6j9mdT-eZma5euxU_Vfql6nDKjsFDR5ftmG_Pws)

---

## üõ°Ô∏è Safety Notice
This tool is **100% safe to use**.

- ‚ùå Does NOT connect to Discord servers
- ‚ùå Does NOT use private or illegal APIs
- ‚ùå Does NOT automate username claiming
- ‚úÖ You manually check availability inside Discord

This keeps your Discord account **safe from bans or flags**.

## üì¶ How to Use
1. Extract the ZIP file
2. Open `index.html`
3. Generate usernames
4. Click to copy
5. Check availability inside Discord
6. Save & manage your username list

No installation required.
